title: Surgical Procedure
description: Eye surgery, also known as ocular surgery, is surgery performed on the eye by an ophthalmologist. The eye is a fragile organ, and requires extreme care before, during, and after a surgical procedure.

title: All Laser Lasik
description: LASIK, which stands for laser in-situ keratomileusis, is a popular surgery that can correct vision in people who are nearsighted or farsighted, or who have astigmatism.

title: Cornea & Glaucoma
description: The thinner the cornea the higher risk of developing glaucoma. The thinner corneas are also associated with an increased severity of visual field loss and a more rapid progression of the disease.
